movies.title: Five Nights at Freddy’s 2
movies.description: Blumhouse horror sequel where creepy animatronics return to torment a new group of night guards in the haunted Freddy Fazbear's Pizza. Sequel to the 2023 hit based on the popular video game franchise.

movies.title: Kill Bill: The Whole Bloody Affair
movies.description: Re-release of Quentin Tarantino’s martial arts revenge epic merging Kill Bill Vol. 1 and Vol. 2 into one unrated saga. Uma Thurman’s Bride unleashes her sword-swinging rampage in the definitive cut.

movies.title: MONSTA X: CONNECT x in CINEMAS
movies.description: Concert film featuring the K-pop group Monsta X performing live. Captures their high-energy show for fans in cinemas.

movies.title: Christina Aguilera: Christmas in Paris
movies.description: Concert film showcasing Christina Aguilera's Christmas performance in Paris with special guest Yseult. Holiday-themed musical event.
